name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (luvcraft)
description:
Dungeon Escape is a tribute to Dragon's Lair, Space Ace, Super Don-Quixote, and other laserdisc arcade games that I have fond childhood memories of. I started it in early 2003 as the game that I used to teach myself Flash, and periodically revisited it over the next 7 years, between other projects, until I'd finally reached my goal of 31 rooms (chosen because Dragon's Lair has 30 rooms) in 2010.

I realized that I'd totally missed the 10th anniversary of its release during Coronageddon last year, and Flash has been officially deprecated (RIP Flash), so I thought it would be cool to make executables of the game and put them up here.

The game's original webpage -- with a timeline of its development -- can be found here:
http://studiohunty.com/dungeon/
